member_organisations:
Le Mat Italy www.lemat.it 
Le Mat Sweden www.lemat.se
fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture and media, Culture, International co-operation and development, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Environment, Youth, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Communication
eu_initiatives: Le Mat Europe follows directly the Social Entrepreneurship Initiatives, the development of social economy and the job creation for vulnerable groups.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: Le Mat Europe is a European social franchising organization and a social co-operative participated by a Swedish and an Italian cooperative. The organization is inspired to create jobs for vulnerable groups of persons mainly in the sustainable tourism branch by managing hotels, hostels and B&Bs or other facilities. A brand and handbooks were developed and the organization supports the development and start-up of new Le Mat special places.
relevant_communication: The Swedish and the Italian member organizations giving life to Le Mat Europe are strongly involved in bringing further the social entrepreneurship, the social economy and the job creation and start-up for young vulnerable groups.
